basics.name: Afsaneh Shams
basics.label: Computer Scientist
basics.summary: Ph.D. candidate in Computer Science with a strong background in Electrical-Telecommunication Engineering. Experienced in research, development, and teaching with a focus on machine learning, data science, and software development.

work.summary: Development and simulation work on the new AI Network.
Assisting in undergraduate and graduate courses related to computer science and electrical engineering. Emphasis on machine learning, data analysis, and programming languages.
Experience of working on more than 10 projects in the electrical and computer engineering fields.

projects.name: Integration of different advanced attention mechanisms, including CBAM and MobileViTv2, into CNNs
projects.description: Enhanced an ECNNB model to AECNNB with MobileViTv2, achieving a 9.77% accuracy boost for CIFAR-10 classifications.

projects.name: Evolutionary CNN for EMNIST_Digits, MNIST, and Fashion_MNIST
projects.description: Developed an evolutionary CNN based model achieving high classification accuracy on EMNIST_Digits, MNIST, and Fashion_MNIST datasets.

projects.name: Efficient Neural Network for Image Classification
projects.description: Implementing an efficient evolved neural network for enhanced image classification accuracy.

projects.name: Deepfake Detection with YOLOv3
projects.description: Fake image region detection & description in deepfake images using YOLOv3.

projects.name: COVID-GAN
projects.description: Classifying COVID-19 from chest X-rays with Generative Adversarial Networks.

projects.name: RNA Structure and EEG Classification
projects.description: Conducted ML analysis for RNA structure prediction and EEG dataset classification.

projects.name: Project Management and Cinema Ticketing Website
projects.description: Developed a Project Management Tool and a Cinema Ticketing Website with PostgreSQL, MySQL, and PhpMyAdmin.

projects.name: Synchronous Collaborative Programming Tool
projects.description: Created a Synchronous Collaborative Programming tool for live coding and cooperative learning.

publications.title: Evolving Efficient CNN Based Model for Image Classification
publications.summary: A detailed study on the application of evolutionary algorithms to optimize convolutional neural network architectures for image classification tasks.

publications.title: Evolutionary CNN-Based Architectures with Attention Mechanisms for Enhanced Image Classification
publications.publisher: De Gruyter, Intelligent Computing series, Expected early 2024
publications.summary: Introduces novel CNN architectures that incorporate attention mechanisms to improve image classification accuracy, optimized through evolutionary algorithms.

publications.title: A Few-Shot Learning Focused Survey on Recent Named Entity Recognition and Relation Classification Models
publications.summary: A survey of few-shot learning models applied to Named Entity Recognition and relation classification, with a focus on recent advancements.

publications.title: A Survey on Recent Random Walk-based Methods for Embedding Knowledge Graphs
publications.summary: A comprehensive survey of random walk-based techniques for embedding knowledge graphs and their applications in various domains.

publications.title: A Survey of Recent Evolutionary Algorithms
publications.summary: A detailed survey of the latest developments and applications of evolutionary algorithms in machine learning and optimization.

awards.title: Outstanding Graduate TA Award
awards.summary: Recognized for exceptional teaching assistance and contribution to student learning outcomes in the computer science department.

Professional Services.name: Judge at the Georgia Science & Engineering Fair
Professional Services.summary: Participated as a judge, evaluating innovative projects in the fields of science and engineering, contributing to the promotion of STEM education.

Professional Services.name: Judge at the Georgia Science & Engineering Fair
Professional Services.summary: Participated as a judge, evaluating innovative projects in the fields of science and engineering, contributing to the promotion of STEM education.
